ast            : true AND false
raw expr       : and(true, false)
checked expr   : and<Boolean, Boolean>(true, false)
output type    : Boolean
output domain  : {FALSE}
output         : false


ast            : null AND false
raw expr       : and(NULL, false)
checked expr   : and<NULL, Boolean NULL>(NULL, CAST(false AS Boolean NULL))
output type    : NULL
output domain  : {NULL}
output         : NULL


ast            : NOT a
raw expr       : not(ColumnRef(0)::NULL)
checked expr   : not<NULL>(ColumnRef(0))
output type    : NULL
output domain  : {NULL}
output         : NULL


ast            : NOT a
raw expr       : not(ColumnRef(0)::Boolean)
checked expr   : not<Boolean>(ColumnRef(0))
evaluation:
+--------+---------------+---------------+
|        | a             | Output        |
+--------+---------------+---------------+
| Type   | Boolean       | Boolean       |
| Domain | {FALSE, TRUE} | {FALSE, TRUE} |
| Row 0  | true          | false         |
| Row 1  | false         | true          |
| Row 2  | true          | false         |
+--------+---------------+---------------+
evaluation (internal):
+--------+-----------------------+
| Column | Data                  |
+--------+-----------------------+
| a      | Boolean([0b_____101]) |
| Output | Boolean([0b_____010]) |
+--------+-----------------------+


ast            : NOT a
raw expr       : not(ColumnRef(0)::Boolean NULL)
checked expr   : not<Boolean NULL>(ColumnRef(0))
evaluation:
+--------+------------------------+------------------------+
|        | a                      | Output                 |
+--------+------------------------+------------------------+
| Type   | Boolean NULL           | Boolean NULL           |
| Domain | {FALSE, TRUE} ∪ {NULL} | {FALSE, TRUE} ∪ {NULL} |
| Row 0  | NULL                   | NULL                   |
| Row 1  | false                  | true                   |
| Row 2  | NULL                   | NULL                   |
+--------+------------------------+------------------------+

| Column | Data                                                               |
+--------+--------------------------------------------------------------------+
| a      | Nullable { column: Boolean([0b_____101]), validity: [0b_____010] } |
| Output | Nullable { column: Boolean([0b_____010]), validity: [0b_____010] } |
+--------+--------------------------------------------------------------------+


ast            : NOT a
raw expr       : not(ColumnRef(0)::Boolean NULL)
checked expr   : not<Boolean NULL>(ColumnRef(0))
evaluation:
+--------+------------------+-----------------+
|        | a                | Output          |
+--------+------------------+-----------------+
| Type   | Boolean NULL     | Boolean NULL    |
| Domain | {FALSE} ∪ {NULL} | {TRUE} ∪ {NULL} |
| Row 0  | false            | true            |
| Row 1  | false            | true            |
| Row 2  | NULL             | NULL            |

| Output | Nullable { column: Boolean([0b_____111]), validity: [0b_____011] } |
+--------+--------------------------------------------------------------------+


ast            : true OR false
raw expr       : or(true, false)
checked expr   : or<Boolean, Boolean>(true, false)
output type    : Boolean
output domain  : {TRUE}
output         : true


ast            : null OR false
raw expr       : or(NULL, false)
checked expr   : or<NULL, Boolean NULL>(NULL, CAST(false AS Boolean NULL))
output type    : NULL
output domain  : {NULL}
output         : NULL

raw expr       : xor(true, false)
checked expr   : xor<Boolean, Boolean>(true, false)

output domain  : {TRUE}
output         : true
